info.senderName: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
info.description:
At 05:07 pm, MetService weather radar detected severe thunderstorms near PYES PA, OROPI, OTANEWAINUKU, TIRAU, PUTARURU, ARAPUNI, MAUNGATAUTARI, OKOROIRE, LICHFIELD, WHITEHALL and HODDERVILLE.
These severe thunderstorms are moving towards the westsouthwest, and are expected to lie near THE MAMAKU PLATEAU, THE SOUTHERN KAIMAI RANGES, CAMBRIDGE, PUTARURU, KARAPIRO, ARAPUNI, MAUNGATAUTARI, LEAMINGTON, HODDERVILLE and ROTOORANGI at 05:37 pm and near TIRAU, PUTARURU, THE MAMAKU PLATEAU, OKOROIRE, CAMBRIDGE, TE AWAMUTU, KIHIKIHI, OHAUPO, ARAPUNI, MAUNGATAUTARI, ROTOORANGI and PANETAPU at 06:07 pm.
These thunderstorms are expected to be accompanied by torrential rain, hail and frequent lightning.
Impact:
Torrential rain can cause surface and/or flash flooding about streams, gullies and urban areas, and make driving conditions extremely hazardous.
Hail can cause damage to crops, orchards and vines and may make driving conditions hazardous.
Frequent lightning is dangerous to people and livestock, especially those exposed outdoors or on the water, and can cause power surges and damage to electrical equipment.

area.areaDesc: South Waikato,Matamata Piako,Western Bay of Plenty,Waipa,Otorohanga,Rotorua
